quote: All that I am, or hope to be, I owe to my angel mother.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: I remember my mother's prayers and they have always followed me. They have clung to me all my life.
name: Abraham Lincoln

quote: The most important thing a father can do for his children is to love their mother.
name: Theodore Hesburgh

quote: Mother is the name for God in the lips and hearts of little children.
name: William Makepeace Thackeray

quote: A mother's arms are made of tenderness and children sleep soundly in them.
name: Victor Hugo

quote: God could not be everywhere, and therefore he made mothers.
name: Rudyard Kipling

quote: Mother's love is peace. It need not be acquired, it need not be deserved.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: I got to grow up with a mother who taught me to believe in me.
name: Antonio Villaraigosa

quote: Children are the anchors of a mother's life.
name: Sophocles

quote: A mother's happiness is like a beacon, lighting up the future but reflected also on the past in the guise of fond memories.
name: Honore de Balzac

quote: Life began with waking up and loving my mother's face.
name: George Eliot

quote: The babe at first feeds upon the mother's bosom, but it is always on her heart.
name: Henry Ward Beecher

quote: Mama was my greatest teacher, a teacher of compassion, love and fearlessness. If love is sweet as a flower, then my mother is that sweet flower of love.
name: Stevie Wonder

quote: When my mother had to get dinner for 8 she'd just make enough for 16 and only serve half.
name: Gracie Allen

quote: The love of a mother is the veil of a softer light between the heart and the heavenly Father.
name: Samuel Taylor Coleridge

quote: There is nothing in the world of art like the songs mother used to sing.
name: Billy Sunday

quote: Motherhood: All love begins and ends there.
name: Robert Browning

quote: Sometimes the strength of motherhood is greater than natural laws.
name: Barbara Kingsolver

quote: With what price we pay for the glory of motherhood.
name: Isadora Duncan

quote: Motherhood is... difficult and... rewarding.
name: Gloria Estefan

quote: I was always at peace because of the way my mom treated me.
name: Martina Hingis

quote: My mother is a walking miracle.
name: Leonardo DiCaprio

quote: My mom is definitely my rock.
name: Alicia Keys

quote: Who's a boy gonna talk to if not his mother?
name: Donald E. Westlake
